description:
Control service is always service index `0`.
It handles actions common to all services on a device.

contents.name: device_description
contents.description: Identifies the type of hardware (eg., ACME Corp. Servo X-42 Rev C)

contents.name: firmware_identifier
contents.description: A numeric code for the string above; used to identify firmware images and devices.

contents.name: bootloader_firmware_identifier
contents.description: Typically the same as `firmware_identifier` unless device was flashed by hand; the bootloader will respond to that code.

contents.name: firmware_version
contents.description: A string describing firmware version; typically semver.

contents.name: device_url
contents.description: Request the information web site for this device

contents.name: firmware_url
contents.description: URL with machine-readable metadata information about updating device firmware
